items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.

bsasId.title: id
bsasId.description: The unique identifier of the summary calculation.

accountingPeriod.title: The accounting period
accountingPeriod.description: An object containing the accounting period start and end dates.

startDate.description: The date the accounting period started.

endDate.description: The date the accounting period ended.

selfEmploymentId.title: selfEmploymentId
selfEmploymentId.description: An identifier for the self-employment business, unique to the customer.

typeOfBusiness.title: typeOfBusiness
typeOfBusiness.description: The type of business the summary calculation is for.

summaryStatus.description: The status of the calculated summary.

adjustedSummary.description: Indicates if summary includes adjusted values.

taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to, for example, 2019-20. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2019-21 is not valid. The minimum tax year is 2019-20.

requestedDateTime.description: The original date and time of the summary calculation before any adjustments.

income.description: The total income for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

expenses.description: The total expenses for the income source. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

additions.description: The total additions to net profit (or deduction to net loss). The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99.

deductions.description: The total deductions to net loss (or addition to net profit). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

net.description: The net profit of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

taxable.description: The taxable net profit of the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

net.description: The net loss of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

adjustedIncomeTax.description: The adjusted income tax loss. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.
